name: Legends of Venari
summary: Legends of Venari is a creature collection RPG that is being built on the ETH network. LoV, in its current state (the Beta Season), is an idle browser-based game where players catch Venari creatures. LoV is an iterative project built alongside the web3 community as features get rolled out over seasons (3-4 Months).
